name: yalla-master-orchestration
description: Yalla London Master Orchestration: Shows how all 7 pipelines interconnect and feed data to each other. The central nervous system of the Zenitha Content Network.

data.prompt:
Topic Research → Content Builder (8 phases) → Quality Gate → Content Selector → Pre-Publication Gate (13 checks) → Schema Injection → Indexing → Affiliate Injection → SEO Monitor → CTR Check → Auto-Rewrite (loop)

Schedule: Daily 5am UTC
Owns: TopicProposal → ArticleDraft → BlogPost lifecycle
Output: Published, indexed articles with affiliate links generating revenue
KPIs: 2 articles/site/day, quality score ≥ 70, 3+ internal links, 2+ affiliate links

Crawl → Technical Audit → Content Audit → CWV Audit → Severity Router → Auto-Fix / Log Warnings → Report → Validate

Schedule: Weekly, Sunday 5am UTC
Owns: Site-wide SEO health, auto-fixes, compliance
Output: Weekly SEO health report, auto-fixed meta tags & schema
KPIs: SEO score ≥ 70, CWV all green, 0 broken links

Data Collection → Traffic Analysis → Revenue Tracking → Audience Segmentation → Action Dispatch → Dashboard Report

Schedule: Daily 3am UTC
Owns: GA4 data, GSC data, revenue metrics, audience segments
Output: Daily analytics report, cross-pipeline action triggers
KPIs: Organic sessions +20%/month, CTR ≥ 3%, RPV trending up

Performance Audit → Accessibility Audit → Priority Router → CWV Fix / A11Y Fix / Optimize → Test & Validate → Deploy

Schedule: On-demand (triggered by CWV alerts or manual)
Owns: Page speed, accessibility, responsive design, UX
Output: Optimized frontend, Lighthouse scores, CWV improvements
KPIs: Lighthouse Perf ≥ 80, A11Y ≥ 90, LCP ≤ 2.5s

Strategy → Content Repurposing → Community Building → Multi-Platform Distribution → Engagement Tracking → Iterate

Schedule: Weekly, Monday 10am UTC
Owns: Social media presence, brand growth, community
Output: 3-5 social posts/site/week, engagement reports
KPIs: Follower growth, engagement rate, social referral traffic

Data Analysis → Hypothesis Generation → A/B Test Design → Test Monitoring → Result Analysis → Implement Winner / Learn & Iterate

Schedule: Bi-weekly, 1st & 15th, 8am UTC
Owns: A/B testing, conversion funnels, CTA optimization
Output: Proven conversion improvements, CRO playbook
KPIs: Visitor-to-lead ≥ 3%, affiliate click rate +20%

Competitor Discovery → Content Gap Analysis → Benchmarking → Action Router → Content Strategy / Technical SEO / Strategy Report

Schedule: Monthly, 1st of month, 2am UTC
Owns: Competitive intelligence, market positioning
Output: Monthly competitive report, content gap TopicProposals
KPIs: Competitive scorecard improving, content gaps shrinking

Central visibility hub for Khaled:
- Pipeline status: Topics → Drafts → Published → Indexed (with counts)
- Per-site health: articles, traffic, revenue, errors
- Action buttons: trigger crons, publish drafts, run audits
- Error alerts in plain language with suggested fixes
- Revenue tracking: affiliate clicks, conversions, earnings
- All 7 pipeline reports feed into dashboard views
- Mobile-first design for iPhone viewing
